alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 6:45AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT IBERIA...EASTERN LAFAYETTE...ST. MARY...EASTERN VERMILION...ST. MARTIN AND EASTERN ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 715 AM CST... At 645 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leonville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Morgan City, Abbeville, Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, Franklin, Carencro, St. Martinville, Patterson, Jeanerette, Berwick, Krotz Springs, Arnaudville, Melville, Belle River, Intracoastal City, Bayou Vista, Avery Island, and Cypremort Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 102 and 127. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
